<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expand Aura](/Feats.aspx?ID=1690) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
You have at least one [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206) from a champion feat or feature.

</column>

---

You focus your divine power to extend your influence. Select one [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206) you have from a champion feat or feature, such as [Aura of Courage](/Feats.aspx?ID=223) or [Aura of Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=250). The radius of the aura is doubled until the start of your next turn.
name: Expand Aura
prerequisite: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
